title: Digital Learning Material Development Project for Biodiversity Conservation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Team-based collaboration to develop animal protection apps and design evaluation tools in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Systematically design digital content for biodiversity education following the five stages of the ADDIE model
Collaboratively develop and test a prototype of a smartphone-based animal protection app
Design digital assessment tools to measure learning effectiveness

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
